mapper.select: select * from rack order by no

select * from (select warehouse.code warehousecode, warehouse.name warehousename, area.code areacode, area.ware_no warehouselocation, area.name areaname, rack.no no, rack.code rackcode, rack.area_no arealocation, rack.name rackname from area, rack, warehouse where warehouse.no = area.ware_no and area.no = rack.area_no) where no=#{no}
